sqlMap.select: SELECT A.YEAR, A.EVAL_DEGREE_ID, A.EVAL_MEMB_USER_ID, A.NAME, A.SC_DEPT_ID, B.SC_DEPT_NM, A.JIKGUB_NM, A.EXCE_EVAL_REASON FROM CBE_EVAL_MASTER A LEFT OUTER JOIN BSC_SC_DEPT B ON A.YEAR=B.YEAR AND A.SC_DEPT_ID=B.SC_DEPT_ID WHERE A.YEAR=#findYear# AND A.EVAL_DEGREE_ID=#findEvalDegreeId# AND A.EVAL_METHOD_GBN='20'

SELECT A.YEAR , A.EVAL_DEGREE_ID , A.EVAL_MEMB_USER_ID , A.NAME , A.SC_DEPT_ID , B.SC_DEPT_NM , A.JIKGUB_ID , A.JIKGUB_NM , A.POS_ID , A.POS_NM , A.WEIGHT_GRP_ID , A.RIVAL_GRP_ID , A.ITEM_FRS_DEPT_ID , A.ITEM_SEC_DEPT_ID , A.ITEM_TEAM_ID , A.WORK_TERM , A.EVAL_METHOD_GBN , A.EXCE_EVAL_REASON FROM CBE_EVAL_MASTER A LEFT OUTER JOIN BSC_SC_DEPT B ON A.YEAR=B.YEAR AND A.SC_DEPT_ID=B.SC_DEPT_ID WHERE A.YEAR = #year# AND A.EVAL_DEGREE_ID = #evalDegreeId# AND A.EVAL_MEMB_USER_ID = #evalMembUserId#
